original_title: 死ぬほど気持ち悪い上司のデカチンに何度もイカされる屈辱レ×プ 変態上司にザーメンマーキングされた相沢みなみ
overview: Minami has a boss who is a well-known pervert and she hates him deeply. He indeed, has an obsession with Minami, to the point he is been developing a kind of animalistic (?) tendency and he concludes that he has to mark his territory and Minami as his property.  He eventually acts on his deranged fantasies and ambushes Minami in the office.  This movie has 2 clear parts. The first part packs all the plot. And the second part is where Minami transitions and ends up accepting the pervert boss.  The actor Masahiro Ueda delivered an appropriate but hardly likable performance, almost cringey even. Hate it or love it I guess.  Minami Aizawa with her crazy hot body carries this movie all by herself. She’s really amazing.
title: Humiliating rape with a big dick by a sick boss who makes her cum over and over again Minami Aizawa cum marked by a perverted boss
